name: The Trees and The Life #008-Lonthoir
description:
"I'm was here when the Orang Kaya lived in prosperity. I was here when people from across the ocean landed on a big island. I was here when they welcomed them with an open hand but returned it with swords and blood. I was here when both foreign-people swap Rhun and New Amsterdam. I was here when the survivor leave behind their home and sail across the sea to find another. I was here when then, and I'm still here now."

This old Canarium tree was photographed in Big Banda Island, Banda Archipelago, Maluku, Indonesia. The Canarium tree is a protector for nutmeg trees that lived side by side from the heat of the sun. This tree can live for hundreds even thousands of years. We can find this tree spread across the 5 main islands of the Banda archipelago.
Banda archipelago is home to the native plant nutmeg. Since the 17 century Dutch colonizer come to these islands and killed natives to monopolize the global trade of spices at that time.

The Trees and The Life is a 10-Photo-Based-NFT Collection made by Danar Tri Atmojo. As the first-ever collection made, Danar dedicated these NFT's to mother nature as we move towards the new era of digitalization using Tezos blockchain as #CleanNFTs.
